originalText.text:
Our children had looked at and spoken to several photographers and settled on Anthony Vazquez.
We engaged with Barbara and Juan for the wedding. Prior to the wedding our kids spoke to Anthony and then mainly dealt with Barbara and Lucille, Anthony‚Äôs Office Mgr.
Lucille was great and very responsive to all our emails and calls and questions. (And there were manyüòä)
Meeting Barbara and Juan the day of was like seeing them after knowing them for a long time. They kept everything on a timeline and flowing. So impressed that after a few pics they knew ALL of our names and were easily able to direct and position us.
Got some sneak peeks and can‚Äôt wait for the full reveal‚ù£Ô∏è‚ù£Ô∏è
Fondly,
Patti Greenberg
MOB

originalText.text: Juan and his team did an amazing job of capturing our wedding and all the fun leading up to it. We hit it off instantly with him at our engagement shoot and knew his style and demeanor would be great for the big day. The few pictures we saw as sneak peeks of the wedding got us even more excited to see the final product as we absolutely loved every second of working with Juan! The whole team at Anthony Vazquez was great and we had an easy experience getting everything all set - Tracy and Matt

originalText.text: We contracted with Barbara Torres at Anthony Vazquez to be our lead photographer.  From the getgo, she was wonderful to work with, starting with our engagement photos.  She guided us through the labyrinth of possibilities to make the day go very smoothly.  We've seen a "sneak peak" of our photos and can't wait to see the rest!

text.text: We contracted with Barbara Torres at Anthony Vazquez to be our lead photographer.  From the getgo, she was wonderful to work with, starting with our engagement photos.  She guided us through the labyrinth of possibilities to make the day go very smoothly.  We've seen a "sneak peak" of our photos and can't wait to see the rest!

originalText.text:
To the most amazing photo/video team,

Thank you does not even begin to express our gratitude!  We had so much fun spending the day with you all, capturing all the highlights of our day and night.  The team was so beyond professional, focused, and organized.  We know that there must have been tiny bumps along the way to handle on our wedding day, but you all handled them so seamlessly and quietly that we had ZERO idea.  The feeling of letting go and knowing you have a safety net around you to ensure everything runs smoothly was priceless. We know it takes a lot of effort from you and your team for that to be the case.  We felt so confident and secure that all of the best shots and reels were being captured.

We went through all of our photos from friends and family‚Äôs iPhones, and saw some of the jaw dropping shots that were captured.  We can only imagine how much more jaw dropping they will be from your professional lenses!!!  We already have a viewing party set up to watch the clips, edits, and raw footage from the video team!  Of course if anyone else we know is getting married, we would steer them right in your direction!!

We hope to see you all soon as guests at future events shot by the Anthony Vazquez team!!

Love,
Mr. and Mrs. Rappaport

originalText.text: Anthony and his whole team (both photo and AV Films) were a DREAM to work with! From our very first meeting with him all the way through the wedding, he and his team were always accessible, helpful, and reassuring. An engagement shoot before the big day proved we were in great hands and a sneak peek at some of our wedding day photos have allowed us to relive the magic all over again! HIGHLY recommend working with Anthony or another one of his photographers if you are looking for that edgier, editorial style of photography, OR if you‚Äôre just looking for a team you‚Äôll be able to trust.
